trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a stream for reading from the blob.
trans-unit.target: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a stream for reading from the blob.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the condition that must be met in order for the request to proceed.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the condition that must be met in order for the request to proceed.

trans-unit.source: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, no condition is used.
trans-unit.target: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, no condition is used.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> object that specifies additional options for the request.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.AsyncCallback</codeEntityReference> delegate that will receive notification when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.AsyncCallback</codeEntityReference> delegate that will receive notification when the asynchronous operation completes.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that will be passed to the callback delegate.
trans-unit.target: A user-defined object that will be passed to the callback delegate.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.ICancellableAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.ICancellableAsyncResult</codeEntityReference> that references the asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: On the <codeEntityReference>T:System.IO.Stream</codeEntityReference> object returned by the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.ICloudBlob.EndOpenRead(System.IAsyncResult)</codeEntityReference> method, the <codeEntityReference>M:System.IO.Stream.EndRead(System.IAsyncResult)</codeEntityReference> method must be called exactly once for every <codeEntityReference>M:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)</codeEntityReference> call.
trans-unit.target: On the <codeEntityReference>T:System.IO.Stream</codeEntityReference> object returned by the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.ICloudBlob.EndOpenRead(System.IAsyncResult)</codeEntityReference> method, the <codeEntityReference>M:System.IO.Stream.EndRead(System.IAsyncResult)</codeEntityReference> method must be called exactly once for every <codeEntityReference>M:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)</codeEntityReference> call.

trans-unit.source: Failing to end the read process before beginning another read process can cause unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: Failing to end the read process before beginning another read process can cause unexpected behavior.

trans-unit.source: Note that this method always makes a call to the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.ICloudBlob.BeginFetchAttributes(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)</codeEntityReference> method under the covers.
trans-unit.target: Note that this method always makes a call to the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.ICloudBlob.BeginFetchAttributes(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobRequestOptions,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)</codeEntityReference> method under the covers.

trans-unit.source: Set the <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.ICloudBlob.StreamMinimumReadSizeInBytes</codeEntityReference> property before calling this method to specify the minimum number of bytes to buffer when reading from the stream.
trans-unit.target: Set the <codeEntityReference>P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.ICloudBlob.StreamMinimumReadSizeInBytes</codeEntityReference> property before calling this method to specify the minimum number of bytes to buffer when reading from the stream.

trans-unit.source: The value must be at least 16 KB.
trans-unit.target: The value must be at least 16 KB.
